questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
Drag and drop the commands from the bottom onto the correct Terraform code in the exhibit to push a network object to a Cisco ASA Firewall device.
Select and Place:
//IMG//
When DevOps practices are integrated into an existing organization, which two characteristics are positive indicators of DevOps maturity? (Choose two.)
Which two statements about Infrastructure as Code are true? (Choose two.)

choices.C: DevOps builds upon Infrastructure as Code.
choices.E: Infrastructure as Code must use the same programming language as the application.
choices.A: Test-driven development practices make use of Infrastructure as Code.
choices.B: Infrastructure as Code refers to automated testing libraries.
choices.D: Infrastructure as Code is based on practices from software development.

discussion.content:
TDD can be done without IaC.

So maybe C & D.

"stdout_lines" is a list and there here is another list under that.

So C makes more sense than B imo.

Selected Answer: C
Yes C is correct.

C.
 
---
show_ip_int_brief["˜stdout_lines'][0][1:]
---

stdout_lines - nested list,
[0], first element of above nested list (extract of all header + interfaces, coma separated for individual elements),
[1:] - 2nd, 3rd, 4th line of the above sub-list.
Option C will include headers. B is correct.

comments.content: No B is not correct as show_ip_int_brief['stdout_lines'] is a nested list.

questions.question_text:
FILL BLANK -
Fill in the blanks to describe the concepts of extending DevOps practices to the network for NetDevOps.
NetDevOps builds and manages networks as a system that enables network services to be consumed in a DevOps approach. Organizations practicing
NetDevOps see changes in the _________ as routine and expected activities, with a well-defined and practiced process for _________ , testing, and __________ network changes. By making them routine, network changes can be small and simple.
